category.name: reg.h
category.brief: reg.h defines regression analysis functions and data types.

function.name: reg_CoefficientOfDetermination
function.doc: reg_CoefficientOfDetermination calculates the Coefficient of Determination which depict the relationship between two data series.

return.doc: the coefficient of correlation (range between 0 and 1) with 0 indication that the fata doesn't fit at all and 1 indicating a perfect fit.

argument.name: y
argument.doc: is the pointer to the first data series.

argument.name: x
argument.doc: is the pointer to the second data series.

argument.name: n
argument.doc: denotes the number of elements in the data series.

function.name: reg_LeastSquareMeans
function.doc: reg_LeastSquareMeans calculates the overall solution that minimizes the sum of the squares of the errors.

argument.name: y
argument.doc: are the values for the y-axis.

argument.name: x
argument.doc: are the values for the x-axis.

argument.name: print
argument.doc: accept the values YES or NO to print the function result.
